4_1CSc14JKdGAQJfQsfCLrduhB6zU4oEMwBf.body: Having trouble using zeronet in Tor browser

> [tkarita](#comment_3_1GervYZoP82e8X1Rgc4wyMkJY2zSsJuq8t): Someone else had problems until they added 127.0.0.1 to their proxy exceptions.  The Tor browser also has stricter https and scripting rules, which might interfere with some ZeroNet sites.

Thanks tkarita. Any suggestions on greater privacy?
